title: How to use facial recognition to find photos of myself online even ones where I am in the background or in them by accident - Quora

response.answer_text: There are a few FR applications available (mostly for government agencies) so I cannot tell how since each application was written in compliance with hardware, technologies, and policies. You should by now familiar with the face detection feature on most of cameras and video camcorders but the features can only focus on direct exposure of the faces because the tech is lack of in-depth (distance from x,y coordinators to planetary z coordinator which is also appear to shift in convection. If you can find web-based FR implementation try to find out if the app allow you edit its source on dimensional features.
